column1: NGR is Brynkinalt Hall. Altitudes for some of the records match but some are 100 to 200 ft. too high. Different observers, big gaps and the gauges may be in diffferent positons on the estate
Some 1880s readings have been corrected for the wrong day and have been left in this record
First 7 months of 1887 are noted by the inspector as being unreliable
